title: Penne Penne Lyrics Savaale Samaali Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Penne Penne Lyrics Savaale Samaali 
Singer(s): S. P. B. Charan
Music: Thaman S

Penne penne minnal penne
kannae kannae kadhal kannae
unnai kandaal ullam yeno
thullum thullum 
penne penne

Boomi melae saami pola
vandhu nindraai
nee yaaro 
un mugavari tharuvaayaa.

Theekul ennai
nirkka vaiththu
petrol ooththi ne ponal
naan engae thappi selveno.

idiyaaga ennai thaakki
engoyo ponaai penne.
mazhayaaga ennai nenaithu
ponaaye ponaaye penne nee

Azhagaale yudham seidhu
alaimodha vaithaai penne
analaaga ennai modhi
kondraai penne

Penne penne minnal penne
kannae kannae kadhal kannae
unnai kandaal ullam yeno
thullum thullum 
penne penne

Boomi melae saami pola
vandhu nindraai
nee yaaro 
un mugavari tharuvaayaa.

Boogambam kooda
purattaadhu ennai.
poopandhu ondru oodhi thalludhey.

Anugundu kooda
asaikkaadha nenjai.
Thunukundu paarvai
thoolaai aakkudhey.

Undhan velvettu kannaale
vetti saaikindraai.
Ennai naai kutti polathaan
meikindraaye.

penne penne...

Naan paartha pengal
oru kodi thaandum,
aanaalum unai pol
yaarum illaye.

Enai paartha pengal
pala kodi thaandum
aanaalum unai pol paarkavillaye.

Un azhagaale enai kolla
kadavul ninaithaano.
illai enakkaaga
unai vaazha sonnaanodi..

Penne penne minnal penne
kannae kannae kadhal kannae
unnai kandaal ullam yeno
thullum thullum 
penne penne
